text: @NYGovCuomo Is there a process where Americans can sign over their $1200 checks to provide for Medical Supplies for the Hospitals of the front lines of the CoronaVirus - Ventilators, Masks, Gowns...whatever they need? Who can figure this out - there has to be a way!
